name: ecommerce-kpi-dashboard
description: SaaS platform for automated e-commerce KPI tracking

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../scheduler && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:scheduler"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:scheduler
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:scheduler"
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
